summary: conjures the soul of your companions
descriptionHtml:
A mod I made, using the spelltome to conjure the soul of any companions. Spell last for 60 seconds.
Companions summoned are all level 81. Go to Whiterun, Jorrvaskr basement. There\'s a side table near the bed in Kodlak Whitemane\'s room. Inside you will find all the spelltomes for Aela the Huntress, Athis, Farkas, Kodlak Whitemane, Njada Stonearm, Ria, Skjor, Torvar, Vignar Grey-Mane and Vilkas.

So why make such a spelltome, there are plenty already. It\'s a shame I can never get to see Skjor or Kodlak in action or go on a quest with me, therefore this spell.
author: simplesim
